lead_paragraph: Undecided women in Philadelphia’s suburbs, a crucial voting bloc, said Mr. Trump had not only failed to win them over but in many cases had repelled them.

byline.contributor: Tara Parker-Pope contributed reporting from Yardley, Pa.

headline.print_headline: Trump Is Given Thumbs Down in the Suburbs
headline.main: Suburban Women Find Little to Like in Donald Trump’s Debate Performance

snippet: Undecided women in Philadelphia’s suburbs, a crucial voting bloc, said Mr. Trump had not only failed to win them over but in many cases had repelled them....
abstract: Several dozen interviews with undecided women in suburban West Chester, Pa, reveal that they were not won over by Donald J Trump in first presidential debate, and in several cases were repelled by him; key to Pennsylvania is expected to be winning educated voters, especially women, in suburbs like this near Philadelphia.
